member.name: T:HandsOnLab1.Converters.EnumValueToDescriptionConverter
member.summary: Supports conversion from an enum value to the description of that value. If the enum value is decorated with the attribute, its Description value is returned. Otherwise, the name of the enum value is returned.
member.remarks: The attribute is optional, however its value must be unique within the enum for the ConvertBack method to work correctly.
